summary:
These mods place a kitchen in the small room behind the main hall in the Hearthfire houses. So now instead of using up the East Wing for a kitchen, you are free to use it as a Library or Armory and still have a working kitchen.
The greenhouses put a greenhouse in the North Wing of Hearthfire's houses. So now you don't have to choose
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/KitGreenBanner_zpsbc74a764.jpg[/img][/center]

[center]The kitchen mods place a kitchen in the small room behind the main hall in the Hearthfire houses. So now instead of using up the East Wing for a kitchen, you are free to use it as a Library or Armory and still have a working kitchen.
The greenhouses put a greenhouse in the North Wing of Hearthfire's houses. So now you don't have to choose between a greenhouse and bedrooms.[/center]

[center][img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/LakeviewBanner2_zps64f00e8b.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=7][color=#38761D]Lakeview Kitchen[/color][/size][/center]

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] There is an oven for baking. I did not put a cooking spit in because there is one just on the other side of the wall in Main Hall.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] Named storage for all food types. Crates for food, barrels, jars, pots, all for specific ingredients that you will need in your cooking and baking. I specifically left these all empty, because you need to gather your own ingredients and fill up your own kitchen.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] Designed for use with my Lakeview greenhouse for the complete growing and cooking experience.


[center][img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/HeljarchenBannerkit_zps792fjfio.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=7][color=#38761D]Heljarchen Kitchen[/color][/size][/center]

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] There is an oven for baking. I did not put a cooking spit in because there is one just on the other side of the wall in Main Hall.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] Named storage for all food types. Crates for food, barrels, jars, pots, all for specific ingrediants that you will need in your cooking and baking. I specifically left these all empty, because you need to gather your own ingredients and fill up your own kitchen.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] Designed for use with my Heljarchen greenhouse for the complete growing and cooking experience.


[center][img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/WinstadBanner_zps4510d79c.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=7][color=#38761D]Winstad Kitchen[/color][/size][/center]

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] There is an oven for baking. I did not put a cooking spit in because there is one just on the other side of the wall in Main Hall.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] Named storage for all food types. Crates for food, barrels, jars, pots, all for specific ingredients that you will need in your cooking and baking. I specifically left these all empty, because you need to gather your own ingredients and fill up your own kitchen.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] I did include a few extra butters as butter seems to be scarce.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] For the milk and the flour storage....there is a shelf of milk bottles and a shelf with flour sacks. While you can use these, in order to let people keep the look of the kitchen, I included the option to leave those where they are and store milk in the big milk jug and flour in the flour crate.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] Designed for use with my Winstad greenhouse for the complete growing and cooking experience.


[center][img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/LakeviewGreenhouseBanner_zps5ab050f8.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=7][color=#38761D]Lakeview Greenhouse[/color][/size][/center]

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] 22 dirt plots for planting.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] I added small chests, ingredients jars, barrels and baskets for extra storage. Except for the jars they are not labeled as I am not quite sure what exactly I would store there. But they do make up in part for the loss of the full storage room.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] Loads of new paintings of plants and some vegs.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] It is all nicely laid out with plenty of room to move around and easy to see what is there.


[center][img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/HeljarchenGreenhouseBanner_zpsb07d4dfc.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=7][color=#38761D]Heljarchen Greenhouse[/color][/size][/center]

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] 27 dirt plots for planting.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] I added small chests, ingredients jars, barrels and baskets for extra storage. Except for the jars they are not labeled as I am not quite sure what exactly I would store there. But they do make up in part for the loss of the full storage room.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] Loads of new paintings of plants and some vegs.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] It is all nicely laid out with plenty of room to move around and easy to see what is there.


[center][img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/WinstadGreenhouseBanner_zpstuem6e6u.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=7][color=#38761D]Winstad Greenhouse[/color][/size][/center]

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] 24 dirt plots for planting.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] I added labeled ingredients jars for extra ingredient storage.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] New paintings of plants and some vegs.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] It is all nicely laid out with plenty of room to move around and easy to see what is there.


[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/TousethismodGreen_zps84fd9b62.gif[/img]

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] You MUST have the Hearthfires DLC in order to use this mod.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] For the kitchens: When you build your house and add the Main Hall, the kitchen will be there in the back room fully furnished. Just remove the workbench from that room.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] For the greenhouses: Build the North Wing Storage Room at your workbench for Lakeview and Winstad. For Heljarchen, build the North Wing Trophy Room. Then remove the workbench for that room at your planning table. You do not need to build any furniture, just the walls, roof, floor etc.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_green_zps9d835971.png[/img] When you enter your home you will find that room furnished already.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_red.png[/img] This file has been cleaned with TES5Edit.



[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/PermissionsGreen_zpsa293948d.gif[/img]

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_red.png[/img] This mod is to be hosted exclusively on Steam and Nexus and no where else.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_red.png[/img] Do not alter and re-upload any part of this mod.

[img]http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n99/Shezrie/bullet_ball_glass_red.png[/img] You must apply to the author of specific resources used in this mod, for permission to use their resources. Although permission is given on their resource download pages. Feel free to use the paintings I made, however please give credit and give credit to Artisanix as well for the painting frames.


[center][b]ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. This content may not be copied, reproduced or re-uploaded in any form without the express permission of the authors. This includes, but is not limited to, all descriptions, images, files, comments, sounds, names. [/b][/center]
author: Shezrie
